nodes.documentation: @title SimpleArtistContract
nodes.name: SimpleArtistContract

nodes.documentation: @dev allows payment direct to contract - if no token will store value on contract
@dev allows artist to withdraw funds sent by non-token holders
nodes.name: withdraw

nodes.documentation:
@dev purchase blocks with your Token ID to be displayed for a specific amount of blocks
@param _tokenId the DART token ID
nodes.name: purchase

nodes.documentation: @dev Attempts to work out the next block which will be funded
nodes.name: getNextBlockToFund

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the blocks which the [provided token has purchased
nodes.name: blocksPurchasedByToken

nodes.documentation: @dev Return token ID for the provided block or 0 when not found
nodes.name: tokenIdOf

nodes.documentation:
@dev Get the block hash the given block number
@param _blocknumber the block to generate hash for
nodes.name: getPurchasedBlockhash

nodes.documentation: @dev Generates default block hash behaviour - helps with tests
nodes.name: nativeBlockhash

nodes.documentation:
@dev Generates a unique token hash for the token
@return the hash and its associated block
nodes.name: nextHash

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns blocknumber - helps with tests
nodes.name: blocknumber
